botlogs.uponline: <@{{user}}> the your bot instance ** `{{botTag}}`** is online!
botlogs.commitrestart: <@{{user}}> the your bot instance **`{{botTag}}`** has been updated and restarted successfully!
botlogs.enduser: <@{{obj}}> `({{obj}})` left the server and its Aplications have been removed!
botlogs.ramkilled: <@{{userID}}> the your bot instance **`{{botTag}} ({{botID}})`** was turned off due to lack of RAM!
botlogs.bottimeout: <@{{userID}}> the your bot instance **`{{botTag}} ({{botID}})`** in the free plan it was turned off due to inactivity!

sitelogs.uponline: <@{{user}}> the your website instance **`{{site}}.discloud.app`** is online!
sitelogs.commitrestart: <@{{user}}> the your website instance **`{{site}}.discloud.app`** has been updated and restarted successfully!
sitelogs.ramkilled: <@{{userID}}> the your website instance **`{{site}}.discloud.app`** was turned off due to lack of RAM!
sitelogs.upsite: <@{{userID}}> the your website instance **`{{site}}.discloud.app`** is online!
sitelogs.commitsite: <@{{userID}}> the your website instance **`{{site}}.discloud.app`** has undergone changes and is now online!
sitelogs.removesite: <@{{userID}}> the your website instance **`{{site}}.discloud.app`** has been successfully removed!
sitelogs.startsite: <@{{userID}}> the your website instance **`{{site}}.discloud.app`** is online!
sitelogs.stopsite: <@{{userID}}> the your website instance **`{{site}}.discloud.app`** is offline!
